column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My Chicago friends swear by Lou Malnati's as THE place for deep dish pizza in the Windy City. We ended up at the original Wells location for tradition's sake
column2: but the quality of food is equally good at all the locations. Â Expect a wait... this place is not a hidden gem but a popular destination experience for locals and tourists alike. But there's a bar and a good local beer (Goose Island 312) so relax.
